cast.name: 尤里斯·伊文思 Joris Ivens
奥尔嘉·祖德霍克 Olga Zuiderhoek

introduction: “时间摩天轮”是1987年9月在荷兰举办的一次大型装置艺术展览。它最初由荷兰前卫设计师Barbara Van Loon提议，做为“阿姆斯特丹：欧洲文化之都”活动的一部分，在著名的博物馆广场兴建五个巨大的表示时分秒运动的摩天轮，每个轮都能单独转动，并伴有不同色彩的光线照射和背景音乐等。本片用实验摄影的手法将雨夜闪烁着奇异光芒的摩天轮给观者的梦幻感觉完整记录下来。A documentary that follows the creation of Time Seeking Circles, an ambitious art project as part of "Amsterdam: European Cultural Capital". This project was organised in September 1987 on the Museumplein in Amsterdam. A time machine was built for this event, consisting of five enormous Ferris wheels. These wheels were activated at particular moments, accompanied by sounds and light shows. The film shows the preparations and execution of the project by its initiator, designer Barbara van Loon. Van Loon worked with the owners of the five Ferris wheels, composers, sound designers and an orchestra.
